010package imagingbook.core;
011
012import java.util.jar.Attributes;
013import java.util.jar.Manifest;
014
015/**
016 * This class provides version information for this library.
017 * See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3697449/retrieve-version-from-maven-pom-xml-in-code
018 * for alternatives.
019 * 
020 * @author WB
021 *
022 */
023public abstract class Info {
024        
025        private Info() {}
026        
027        /**
028         * Reads version information from the MANIFEST.MF file of the JAR file from
029         * which this class was loaded. 
030         * 
031         * @return A string with the version information. 
032         * "UNKNOWN" is returned if the library was not loaded from a JAR file or if 
033         * the version information could not be determined.
034         */
035        public static String getVersionInfo() {
036                Manifest mf = FileUtils.getJarManifest(Info.class);
037                if (mf == null) {
038                        return "UNKNOWN";
039                }
040                //IJ.log("listing attributes");
041                Attributes attr = mf.getMainAttributes();
042                String version = null;
043                String buildTime = null;
044                try {
045                        version = attr.getValue("Implementation-Version");
046                        buildTime = attr.getValue("Build-Time");
047                } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) { }
048                return version + " (" + buildTime + ")";
049        }
050
051}
